com.fasterxml.storemate.backend.leveldb

Class LevelDBConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fasterxml.storemate.store.backend.StoreBackendConfig
      • com.fasterxml.storemate.backend.leveldb.LevelDBConfig

  • public class LevelDBConfig
extends StoreBackendConfig
    Simple configuration class for LevelDB - based backend.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      org.skife.config.DataAmount dataCacheSize
      Size of main data cache, in bytes.
      File dataRoot
      Name of root directory (using relative or absolute path) in which data directions will be created (one for main DB, another for last-modified index DB)
      org.skife.config.DataAmount indexCacheSize
      Size of cache for last-modified index.

    • Field Detail

      • dataRoot

        public File dataRoot
        Name of root directory (using relative or absolute path) in which data directions will be created (one for main DB, another for last-modified index DB)

        Should not be same as the directory in which data files are stored (nor the main deployment directory)

      • dataCacheSize

        public org.skife.config.DataAmount dataCacheSize
        Size of main data cache, in bytes. Should be big enough to allow branches to be kept in memory, but not necessarily the whole DB.

        Default value is 50 megs.

      • indexCacheSize

        public org.skife.config.DataAmount indexCacheSize
        Size of cache for last-modified index. Should typically be smaller than the main cache.

        Default value is 20 megs.
